TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OleDbError extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Collects information relevant to a warning or error returned by the data source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is created by the OleDb data adapter when an error occurs. An instance of OleDbError is created and managed by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> class, which in turn is created by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbException> class.
If the severity of the error is too great, the server may close the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>. However, the user can reopen the connection and continue.
## Examples The following example displays the properties of the OleDbError.
[!code-cs[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.data.oledb.oled_4_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.data.oledb.oled_4_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a short description of the error.
Docs.value: A short description of the error.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays the properties of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError>.

[!code-cs[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.data.oledb.oled_20_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.data.oledb.oled_20_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the provider that generated the error.
Docs.value: The name of the provider that generated the error.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays the properties of an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError>.
[!code-cs[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.data.oledb.oled_13_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.data.oledb.oled_13_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the five-character error code following the ANSI SQL standard for the database.
Docs.value: The five-character error code, which identifies the source of the error, if the error can be issued from more than one place.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays the properties of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError>.
[!code-cs[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.data.oledb.oled_12_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.data.oledb.oled_12_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the complete text of the error message.
Docs.returns: The complete text of the error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The string is in the form "OleDbError:", followed by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError.Message%2A>, and the stack trace. For example:
OleDbError:UserId or Password not valid. \<stack trace>
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> within the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> collection.
[!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbError.ToString Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.data.oledb.oled_14_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic WebData OleDbError.ToString Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.data.oledb.oled_14_1.cs)]
